name: John Doe
text: Hi Sumit, my name is Jan and I'm here to help you with your insurance policy details. Is there anything I can help you with?

name: John Doe
text: Hi Sumit, I apologize for the inconvenience caused. I understand that you are not satisfied with our services. Please let me know what the issue is so that I can help you better.

name: John Doe
text: Hi Sumit, I'm sorry, I'm not sure what you mean by "hhhh". Can you please provide more information so that I can assist you?
